{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04892v1", "title": "Recent progress on second-order elliptic and parabolic equations in
  double divergence form", "summary": "This article presents a comprehensive overview and supplement to recent
developments in second-order elliptic partial differential equations formulated
in double divergence form, along with an exploration of their parabolic
counterparts.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-07T10:00:22Z"}
